EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy tried calling today (1560368186.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy tried calling today (1560368186.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Mashal,
I hope all is well with you today. I tried calling using the 449-4523 number and the receptionist could not transfer me. Would there be a different number I could use to call you? I was working on a few things with Simin and I hoping to schedule some time with you to review everything and see if we can proceed. Please let me know the best number to use to get a hold of you as well as when you would have some time for me. Thank you and have a good one.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
